case_title: MUHAMMAD ASLAM vs AZAD GOVERNMENT OF THE STATE OF JAMMU AND KASHMIR, MUZAFFARABAD and 4 others
court_name: Azad Jammu and Kashmir Service Tribunal
respondent: Azad Government of the State of Jammu and Kashmir, Muzaffarabad and 4 others

facts.incident_details: Computer and printer stolen from the Office of the Conservator Range Land Division

appellant.admission: Inquiry conducted was in order and misconduct was committed
appellant.plea: Dismissal penalty is harsh for a low-paid government employee

tribunal_findings.appellant_duty: Expected to remain vigilant and alert
tribunal_findings.appellant_statement: Claimed heavy rain and wind caused him to seek shelter, leading to theft
tribunal_findings.tribunal_observation: Story not accepted; lack of service discipline noted
tribunal_findings.penalty_decision: No valid reason for lesser penalty
